original_text: And ye have this day rejected your God, who himself saved you out of all your adversities and your tribulations; and ye have said unto him, Nay, but set a king over us. Now therefore present yourselves before the Lord by your tribes, and by your thousands.
korean_text: 너희는 너희를 모든 재난과 고통 중에서 친히 구원하여 내신 너희의 하나님을 오늘 버리고 이르기를 우리 위에 왕을 세우라 하는도다 그런즉 이제 너희의 지파대로 천 명씩 여호와 앞에 나아오라 하고

sentences.original_text: And ye have this day rejected your God
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 너희는 오늘 너희의 하나님을 거절하였느니라

sentences.original_text: who himself saved you out of all your adversities
and ye have said unto him, Nay
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 너희가 그에게 말하기를 아니라 하였느니라

sentences.original_text: but set a king over us
Now therefore present yourselves before the Lord
by your tribes, and by your thousands
